sentence.Network_en: For instance, when using flat - bottomed cutter to process curved surface, negative margin cannot be offered.
sentence.Network_cn: 如在使用平底刀做曲面加工时, 不能给负余量.

sentence.Network_en: Nautical A small, flat - bottomed fishing boat with a lugsail on a raking mast.
sentence.Network_cn: 平底(渔)船:小型平底鱼船,在倾斜桅杆上有四角帆.

sentence.Network_en: COLO - 16 cells were inoculated in 96 - well flat - bottomed plates at a concentration of 5 x lOVml.
sentence.Network_cn: COLO -16细胞以5×10~4/孔密度接种于96孔细胞培养板上.

auth_sentence.content: When he canters, other horses are flat out.
